attributes.title: people 👫 love ❤️ that ❓i 🙋‍♀️ hate 🤬 myself 🚷
attributes.review:
i climbed outside of my head  🤯  and watched myself implode  💥  a thought without a body 🧍‍♀️ ought to be the shot to take a load off  🔫  my brain is poisoned    🧠🧪  and im searching for the antidote 🩹 but everytime i find it 🧐 my defenses scream oh no you dont 👮‍♀️🤚
😹 but im fine 😀 no really ‼️ im fine 🧍‍♀️

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: So I tried downloading this app over a week ago and it just now finished downloading I thought something was fishy after the extreme wait but it turns out it was because they were stealing all my information and even took over $3000 out of my bank account THIS APP IS AWFUL IF I COULD RATE IT IN THE NEGATIVES I WOULD it hacked my phone and sent texts to my loved ones saying I was DEAD Trump is funneling your money out of your own pockets and spreading propaganda to your beloveds ANYONE WHO IS THINKING OF DOWNLOADING IT DO NOT I REPEAT DO NOT unless you want to end up broke and apparently dead. My Facebook has never received so many messages my aunt Stacy posted on my board that she was happy it happened and now there’s a huge fight going on in my family THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE SOMEONE PLEASE VENMO ME

attributes.title: Bad pumpkin
attributes.review: Hi Donald. I heard you want to delete TikTok cause we’re making fun of you. Sorry. No can do. Listen you oversized carrot.  TikTok is a family. Something you don’t know very much about clearly since your own wife laughs at your own downfall. Delete TikTok you will start another world war and it won’t be pretty. I really hope this app gets taken down. Oh and if you do end up coming to Jacksonville, hope you have a peaceful stay you giant Cheeto puff
There seems to a bunch of misguided information in the app along with crashing and glitching.

attributes.title: All I have to say is. . .
attributes.review: . . .go away . . . and get a grip on global warming, please!

attributes.title: SO DISAPPOINTING
attributes.review: i was so excited to have this app and be able to share it with my fellow wasp moms on our daily power walks around the neighborhood, but as soon as i opened it, everything went wrong!  >:( i started to get emails, calls and texts from foreigners claiming to have all of my valuable information stored on my phone, like the pictures of my sons new confederate flag tapestry, or the beautiful, custom white hooded gowns my husband just bought for our family :(((( even worse, this app caused my facebook feed to change to only people of different racial, religious and sexual identities than mine— and you all know that us Trump supporters hate anything that’s not white, cis, straight and christian :’( very disappointed, mr trump, please make this app great again

attributes.title: I realized...
attributes.review: I’m not a racist orange with a rug on my head.

attributes.title: To put it simply this app is only for Karen’s
attributes.review: Have fun voting for a rapist and pedo❤️

attributes.title: ABSOLUTE TRASH!!!!
attributes.review: Who allowed Mr. Donald J. Trump to make an app!? It’s outrageously glitchy, hacked my credit card, AND spammed my phone with flag emojis ( 🇺🇸) I love my flag, but i don’t like them in my text app!!!!! If you are seeing this, tell Apple to remove it from the app store!!! 😡🤬
